title: Understanding charge carrier dynamics in organic photocatalysts for hydrogen evolution
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01808G, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jinhyuk Choi, Wooteak Jung, Soranyel Gonzalez-Carrero, James R. Durrant, Hyojung Cha, Taiho Park
This review surveyed the charge behavior in organic photocatalysis, and elucidated a correlation between molecular structure, charge dynamics and photocatalytic performance.
